Article Title: Cognizant Americas EVP clarifies on Rs 2.5 lakh annual package: Our compensation for engineering graduates is ...
Article Text: IT giant Cognizant has found itself in the crosshairs of social media criticism over its salary packages. The company has clarified that the much-discussed (or rather much-trolled) Rs 2.52 lakh annual salary offer is intended for non-engineering undergraduate degree holders, and not for engineering graduates.Contrary to the online uproar, Cognizant asserts that its starting salary for fresh engineering graduates ranges from Rs 4 lakh to Rs 12 lakh annually, depending on factors like specialization and certifications.The company has emphasized that its compensation for engineering graduates is competitive with industry standards and even surpasses those of some peers."Our recent job posting for talent from non-engineering backgrounds, with a 3-year undergraduate degree has been grossly misrepresented. This job posting, with compensation of Rs 2.52 lakhs annually, was only for candidates with a 3-year undergraduate degree and not for engineering graduates."Our annual compensation for fresh engineering graduates ranges from Rs 4 lakhs to Rs 12 lakhs annually, depending on the category of hiring, skill set, and advanced industry accredited certifications," said Surya Gummadi, EVP and President, Cognizant Americas ."The compensation we offer for engineering graduates is highly competitive within the IT services peer group," he said. He said Cognizant has been recruiting and upskilling freshers from engineering institutions as well as colleges offering degrees in science, arts, and commerce."We have been recruiting and upskilling freshers from engineering institutions as well as colleges offering degrees in science, arts, and commerce. Today, as AI increasingly powers modern businesses, we are creating new pathways for talent to thrive in India's technology industry," Gummadi further said.Talking of Cognizant's India operation, Gummadi said, "India is the heart of Cognizant and its largest talent hub - with over 70 per cent of its over 3,36,000 global workforce - based in major metros and Tier-2 cities, across the country."
Article Summary: IT giant Cognizant has found itself in the crosshairs of social media criticism over its salary packages. The company has clarified that the much-discussed (or rather much-trolled) Rs 2.52 lakh annual salary offer is intended for non- engineering undergraduate degree holders.

Article Title: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has 'this comparison' for Harry Potter's villain
Article Text: Tesla cEO Elon Musk has sparked controversy by likening Brazil ‚Äôs Chief Justice Alexandre de Moraes to the notorious Harry Potter villian, Lord Voldemort. The SpaceX CEO‚Äôs tweet, which has since gone viral, juxtaposes photos of Judge Moraes and Voldemort side by side.In the tweet, Judge Moraes is shown wearing a Black cloak reminiscent of Voldemort‚Äôs attire, while the villain brandishes a wand in the adjacent image.Musk captioned the post on X with, ‚ÄúThe resemblance is uncanny. Alexandre de Voldemort.‚ÄùThis comes after social media platform X, formerly Twitter, said on August 16 that it will close its operations in Brazil.The company claimed that Brazilian Supreme Court Justice Alexandre de Moraes threatened to arrest its legal representative in Brazil if they did not comply with orders.X is removing all remaining Brazil staff in the country ‚Äúeffective immediately,‚Äù though the company said service will still be available to the people of Brazil. The company did not clarify how it could claim to suspend operations while continuing to provide services to Brazilians.Earlier this year, the company clashed with de Moraes over free speech, far-right accounts and misinformation on X. The company said his most recent orders amounted to censorship, and shared a copy of the document on X.‚ÄúMoraes has chosen to threaten our staff in Brazil rather than respect the law or due process,‚Äù the company said in a statement on X. "The decision to close the ùïè office in Brazil was difficult, but, if we had agreed to @alexandre‚Äôs (illegal) secret censorship and private information handover demands, there was no way we could explain our actions without being ashamed," Musk posted.
Article Summary: Elon Musk likens Brazil's Chief Justice Alexandre de Moraes to Harry Potter villain Lord Voldemort. The SpaceX CEO‚Äôs tweet juxtaposes photos of Judge MorAes and Voldemort side by side. This comes after social media platform X, formerly Twitter, said on August 16 that it will close its operations in Brazil.

Article Title: Google Messages Brings RCS to dual SIM cards
Article Text: According to an online report, Google is expanding the reach of its advanced messaging service , RCS , with support for dual SIM devices. This long-awaited feature will allow users to enjoy enhanced messaging experiences on both their phone numbers.As reported by 9to5Google, Google Messages is now adding RCS support to dual SIM devices. With dual SIM RCS, users can expect features like read receipts, typing indicators, and high-quality image sharing on both SIM cards.This is particularly beneficial for those who use separate numbers for personal and professional communication.‚ÄúWe see two SIM cards ‚ÄúConnected‚Äù in RCS setting, while there‚Äôs a new ‚ÄúBackup format for sending attachments‚Äù setting that says ‚ÄúSMS with a link.‚Äù This sounds like the Google Photos video upload feature that was quietly removed last year. A return would be unexpected,‚Äù mentions the report.While Google has yet to officially announce the rollout, early indications suggest that the feature is in development and may be available to users in the near future.
Article Summary: Google Messages is now adding RCS support to dual SIM devices. With dual SIM RCS, users can expect features like read receipts, typing indicators, and high- quality image sharing on both SIM cards. Early indications suggest that the feature is in development and may be available to users in the near future.

Article Title: Android Auto gets a Siri-like makeover for Google Assistant
Article Text: Google is giving its voice assistant on Android Auto a fresh look that bears a striking resemblance to Apple's Siri . The new Google Assistant UI appears during voice interactions , offering a more prominent and interactive experience for users.Previously, the Google Assistant interface on Android Auto was limited to a bottom bar for initial commands.However, the new design introduces a circular-shaped pill that appears when the assistant is waiting for a user's response. This interface dynamically responds to the assistant's speech and user input, disappearing once the request is processed.While the functional changes are minimal, the visual overhaul brings a modern and engaging feel to Android Auto. The new UI is currently available on the Galaxy Z Fold 6 with Android Auto version 12.5 and is expected to roll out to more devices in the coming weeks.This update comes as Google continues to refine its Android Auto experience and compete with Apple's CarPlay .
Article Summary: The new Google Assistant UI appears during voice interactions. It is currently available on the Galaxy Z Fold 6 with Android Auto version 12.5. The update comes as Google continues to refine its Android Auto experience and compete with Apple's CarPlay.

Article Title: PM Modi‚Äôs I-Day tech slogan, Apple‚Äôs iPhone production update, Pixel 9 series launch and more tech news of the week
Article Text:
'Design in India, Design for World': What PM Narendra Modi's 'new slogan' for tech industry on Independence Day means



Apple India operations cross over Rs 2 lakh crore, driven by iPhone production growth



Everything announced at Google's 'Made by Google' hardware showcase: Three new Pixel 9 phones, a new Pixel Fold, two Pixel Watches and more



Realme unveils 320W SuperSonic Charge, promises to charge smartphone in 4 min 30 seconds



Lenovo launches Legion Tab gaming tablet with Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 in India



Noise Buds N1 Pro with 60 hours battery life launched in India: Price, specs and more



20,000-plus job cuts at Dell: Employee describes layoffs as 'a bit of a dumpster fire'



Cisco to lay off 6000 employees, CEO says "we're now returning ..."



Airtel, Reliance Jio and Vodafone to TRAI: Time to regulate Google, WhatsApp, Telegram and others



Ola Cabs rebranded as Ola Consumer, now includes Ola Credit, Ola Pay and more



World‚Äôs largest crypto exchange renters Indian market after paying a penalty of Rs 18.82 crore



Swiggy UPI comes to app: How to set it up as payment method, a step-by-step guide



Prime Minister Narendra Modi shared a new mantra for the Indian IT industry with his " Design in India , Design for the World" slogan during India's 78th Independence Day celebrations this week. Emphasising the nation's growing prowess in design, Modi urged Indian IT professionals to aim for global standards. Meanwhile, Apple has marked a major milestone in India, with its operations valued at over Rs 2 lakh crore ($23.5 billion) for fiscal year 2024, reflecting a significant increase driven by increased iPhone production and domestic sales.On the hardware front, Google unveiled multiple Pixel devices , including a second-generation foldable phone along with several new AI features. All this and more on this week‚Äôs TOI-Gadgets Now‚Äôs weekly tech wrap.Prime Minister Narendra Modi has a special 'make in India' for the Indian IT industry this Independence Day. In an address to the nation from Red Fort on India's 78th Independence Day, PM Modi coined a new phrase -- "Design in India, Design for the world". Exalting the indigenous design capabilities of the Indian technology industry, PM Modi called upon Indian IT professionals to create products that cater to both domestic as well as international markets.In his address during the 78th Independence Day celebrations, "India is known for its best quality. Now, we need to focus on design and we need to try to make the Indian standard become the global standard."We have talent...in the field of design, we can contribute immensely to the world. We need to move forward with the vision of 'Design in India, Design for the world'," he added. Click here to read more Apple‚Äôs India operations reached a value of over Rs 2 lakh crore ($23.5 billion) in the fiscal year 2024, according to a report by the Economic Times. This marks a substantial increase from the previous year‚Äôs Rs 1.15 lakh crore. The growth is attributed to increased iPhone production and domestic sales of MacBooks, iMacs, iPads, Watches and AirPods.The report quotes a top official who said that Apple ‚Äúhas likely exhibited the fastest growth in production and exports by any company in the last 50 years in India, making the Cupertino-based tech giant the largest global value chain (GVC) operating domestically.‚Äù Read the full story here Even though Google was two months early in its usual schedule, it came in with a full bang at its hardware reveal. From Gemini taking centre stage to a slew of new hardware, Google pulled out all the stops at its ‚ÄúMade by Google‚Äù showcase. We saw not one, not two, but four new Pixel phones, including a second-gen foldable that has a weird name. And did I mention AI? It's everywhere, folks. Click here to read more Realme has unveiled its 320W SuperSonic Charge technology at the company‚Äôs 828 Fan Festival in China. The company claims that 320W is by far the world‚Äôs fastest charging technology.The Chinese smartphone claims that the 320W fast charging technology can completely charge in just 4 minutes and 30 seconds. ‚ÄúIn only one minute, the 320W charger can power a device to 26% capacity, and it takes less than two minutes to charge a phone to over 50%,‚Äù claims the company.Along with the world‚Äôs first fast charging technology, Realme has also introduced a folded battery, boasting a 4,420 mAh battery. Each cell is under 3mm thick, yet provides a 10% increase in capacity over traditional designs. This marks the world‚Äôs first quad-cell smartphone battery. Read the full story here Lenovo has launched its latest gaming tablet, the Lenovo Legion Tab, in India. The Legion Tab will be available for purchase on Lenovo.com and Flipkart from August 15, priced at Rs 39,999.The Legion Tab features an 8.8-inch QHD+ Lenovo PureSight gaming display with a 144Hz refresh rate and 500 nits of brightness. The tablet weighs at 350 grams and measures 7.6mm in thickness.The Legion Tab is powered by Qualcomm‚Äôs Snapdragon 8+ Gen1 4nm processor, 12GB of LPDDR5X memory, and 256GB of onboard storage (expandable up to 1TB). The tablet uses Legion ColdFront vapor thermal solution for efficient cooling, and offers three performance modes: Beast, Balanced, and Energy Saving.The tablet is powered by a 6550mAh battery with 45W fast charging support and features a USB Type-C port with DisplayPort 1.4 compatibility. Click here to read more Domestic wearable brand Noise has expanded its product portfolio with the launch of the Noise Buds N1 Pro TWS earbuds. These new earbuds succeeded the Noise Buds N1, which was one of the highest-selling products for the company. Powered by advanced Active Noise Cancellation (ANC), Noise Buds N1 Pro filter out background noise and has a chrome and metallic finish.Available in four colours - Chrome Black, Chrome Green, Chrome Purple and Chrome Beige, the Noise Buds N1 Pro will be available at the launch price of Rs 1,499. Noise Buds N1 Pro will be available exclusively on Amazon by the end of the month and will also be available on gonoise.com in the coming days. Read the full story here Earlier this month, Dell announced the restructuring effort centred around artificial intelligence (AI) integration, implementing workforce reductions starting this week across different departments, leading to what some employees believe could be the largest round of layoffs in the company's history."Through a reorganisation of our go-to-market teams and an ongoing series of actions, we are becoming a leaner company," a Dell spokesperson told Business Insider. The layoffs are expected to continue throughout the quarter, affecting multiple divisions within the organisation. Click here to read more Networking giant Cisco Systems recently announced its plans to lay off approximately 7% of its global workforce as the company shifts focus towards high-growth areas like artificial intelligence and cybersecurity. This marks Cisco's second major round of job cuts in 2024.While Cisco did not specify the exact number of positions to be eliminated, the 7% reduction could possibly affect around 6,000 employees based on its reported workforce of 84,900 as of July 2023. The company previously laid off 4,000 workers in February.The job cuts come as Cisco reported a 10% year-over-year decline in quarterly revenue to $13.64 billion. However, this still exceeded market expectations of $13.54 billion. Read the full story here Reliance Jio, Bharti Airtel and Vodafone Idea have asked the Telecom Regulatory Authority of India (TRAI) to make new rules for messaging apps such as WhatsApp, Google‚Äôs RCS and Telegram. According to a report by Economic Times, they have asked TRAI to create licenses or permissions for these OTT (over-the-top) communication apps, stating they provide similar services to what mobile phone operators offer. OTT players refers to those apps and services that work over the internet. Click here for more details Ola Group has rebranded its ride-hailing platforms, Ola Cabs as Ola Consumer. Under the new brand, the company will offer services like fully automated warehousing solutions, Ola Credit, Ola Pay, electric logistics and more.With Ola Consumer, the company aims to bring AI shopping Co-Pilot ‚Äì a conversational AI led tool to deliver a personalized and interactive shopping experience. It will help users connect seamlessly with social media and other apps, creating a cohesive and integrated shopping experience across all platforms.Ola Consumer is also bringing 100% electric logistics. In a press release, the company said that ‚Äúthis would serve as the future of work, a multi-work platform, and a choice of jobs for gig workers leading to reduced costs, with plans to increase jobs by 2.5 lac additional jobs by March 2025 with this platform.‚Äù Click here to read more World‚Äôs largest crypto exchange Binance is all set to re-enter the Indian market. The company, in a press release said that it has registered as a reporting entity with India‚Äôs Financial Intelligence Unit (FIU), upholding the country‚Äôs ‚Äòhighest regulatory standards‚Äô.‚ÄúThe registration with the FIU underscores Binance‚Äôs commitment to compliance with anti-money laundering (AML) standards in India as well as any other jurisdiction it operates in. This step is a testament to Binance‚Äôs dedication to fostering a secure, transparent, and efficient ecosystem, aligning with the company‚Äôs global standards,‚Äù the company said in a press release. Read the full story here Swiggy UPI is now integrated in the Swiggy app and users ordering food can use this method to quickly make payments without having to rely on third-party apps, the company has said, adding that this move simplifies and expedites user experience. Last year, Zomato introduced a similar service.This means users can now complete UPI transactions without leaving the Swiggy app and is powered by Juspay's HyperUPI Plugin.Online food delivery platform said that with the integration of the National Payments Corporation of India‚Äôs (NPCI) digital payments solution, the time for making payments will cut transaction time from over 15 seconds to 5 seconds. Click here to read more
Article Summary: Apple India operations cross over Rs 2 lakh crore, driven by iPhone production growth. Realme unveils 320W SuperSonic Charge, promises to charge smartphone in 4 min 30 seconds. Lenovo launches Legion Tab gaming tablet with Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 in India. Google unveiled multiple Pixel devices, including a second- generation foldable phone.

Article Title: What is ‚Äòvery demure, very mindful‚Äô trend and why it has gone viral
Article Text:
Backstory of ‚Äòvery demure, very mindful‚Äô trend

What does demure mean?

Very demure , very mindful is the latest internet sensation that has gone viral on TikTok . This social media phenomenon was started by beauty influencer Jools Lebron earlier this month. Many celebrities including Jenna Ortega, Jennifer Lopez, Penn Badgley, Lindsay Lohan, Joe Biden and Jamie Lee Curtis have hopped on the trend which has taken the internet by storm.As mentioned above, the phrase "very demure, very mindful" was first used by the TikTok influencer Jools Lebron who used it in her video that has garnered over a million views.In the video she said "See how I do my makeup for work? Very demure, very mindful. I don't do too much. I'm very mindful while I'm at work. See how I look? Very presentable. A lot of you girls go to the interview, looking like Marge Simpson and go to the job looking like Patty and Selma, not demure,".She later posted a second video where she discussed being "demure," "cutesy," and "mindful,".Speaking to CBS Mornings - a US publication, Lebron said ‚ÄúYour demure is what it means to you. It's being mindful and considerate of the people around you, but also of yourself and how you present to the world,"."I was like, let's go very natural. Let's not do too much. So then I was like, I don't show up to the first day with a green cut crease. I don't show up looking like a clown, but I was really referencing how I had shown up at another job," she further explained.‚ÄúWe're all like in this; we're unified, like nothing has to be so serious. Nothing has to be so aggressive. Like everything could just be very cute. Where, you know, we don't do too much. We only do a little bit. I'm not crazy with it. I'm very demure,‚Äù she added.Lebron identifies as a transgender woman. Her TikTok profile @joolieannie has 1.5 followers and has amassed 97 million likes.
Article Summary: The phrase "very demure, very mindful" was first used by the TikTok influencer Jools Lebron who used it in her video that has garnered over a million views. Many celebrities including Jenna Ortega, Jennifer Lopez, Penn Badgley, Lindsay Lohan, Joe Biden and Jamie Lee Curtis have hopped on the trend.

Article Title: Apple event: iPhone 16 series, AirPods 4, Watch Series 10 and other expected launches
Article Text:
Apple event expected date

Apple iPhone 16 series expected features



Apple watch 10 series, Watch Ultra 3 and more

Apple is expected to host its next event this year in the month of September. At the event, the Cupertino-based company is said to bring its new smartphone series - iPhone 16 along with Apple Watch Series 10 , AirPods 4 and more. Here‚Äôs what to expectApple typically unveils its new iPhones in early September. Based on past events, the iPhone 16 series launch event may be hosted on September 10.Pre-orders might begin about three days later, possibly on September 13, while the phones may hit stores a week after that, potentially on September 20. This timeline aligns with reports from South Korean carriers, who anticipate receiving iPhones for an international launch around that time.On the design front, the rumours suggest that Apple is using an enhanced process for finishing and colouring titanium which may lead to a glossier appearance compared to the brushed aluminum finish of the ‚Äå iPhone 15 Pro‚Äå models. This glossy finish may be similar to the stainless steel used in previous years but it is expected to offer better scratch resistance.While the official colour names haven't been confirmed, Apple is likely to continue using the Titanium branding from the ‚ÄåiPhone 15 Pro‚Äå models.The 2024 iPhones will run iOS 18 operating system. The series may offer four phones ‚Äì iPhone 16, iPhone 16 Plus, iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max. The comparatively ‚Äòaffordable‚Äô iPhones - iPhone 16 and iPhone 16 Plus are likely to be powered by A18 Bionic chipset. While the Pro models - iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max are tipped to come equipped with A18 Pro processor.Alongside the new iPhones, Apple may unveil its Watch series 10 along with Apple Watch Ultra 3. It is also expected that the company may bring an affordable third-generation Apple watch SE.In addition, an updated AirPods version is expected ‚Äì Apple AirPods 4. According to rumours, the earbuds may come powered by H2 chipset and may offer an improved battery life. Bloomberg‚Äôs Mark Gurman says that the company may announce two models of AirPods 4 with USB Type-C charging port.
Article Summary: Apple is expected to host its next event this year in the month of September. At the event, the Cupertino-based company is said to bring its new smartphone series - iPhone 16 along with Apple Watch Series 10 and AirPods 4. Based on past events, the iPhone 16 series launch event may be hosted on September 10.

Article Title: Google launches Pixel 9 Pro Fold, it‚Äôs first-ever foldable phone in India
Article Text:
Pixel 9 Pro Fold has bigger and brighter displays

Tensor G4, Gemini and more AI inside

Upgraded cameras with the new 'Add me' AI feature for photos

Google has launched its second-generation Pixel foldable phone, the Pixel 9 Pro Fold , which is its first-ever foldable phone in India. The second-gen Pixel Fold upgrades on some salient aspects over the first one. Per Google, the foldable is slim, super durable, and has a brighter screen, both on the outside and inside. And, the phone also packs in Pixel‚Äôs ‚Äúfastest, most powerful‚Äù Tensor G4 chip , bringing on-device multimodal capabilities to the phone.On the inside, the Pixel 9 Pro Fold comes equipped with an 8 inches ‚ÄòSuper Actua Flex display,‚Äô an LTPO panel with a 2922x1344 resolution at 486 PPI. The inner screen has a dynamic refresh rate of 1-120Hz and can go as bright as 3,000 nits, which Google says is 80% brighter than the screen on the first-gen Pixel Fold. To make use of phone‚Äôs large inner canvas, there‚Äôs a split-screen mode that‚Äôll let you use two apps side-by-side.When unfolded, the Pixel 9 Pro Fold can be used a regular phone with a 6.3 inches outer screen, which has the same specs as the inner screen.Google says that the Pixel 9 Pro Fold has an ‚Äúall-new‚Äù hinge that is made from stainless steel and has an aerospace grade aluminium alloy cover. The hinge has a polished finish, while the back has the silky matt finish. The phone is rated IPX8 for water resistivity. And there‚Äôs Gorilla Glass Victus 2 on the outside.Powering the Pixel 9 Pro Fold is Google‚Äôs Tensor G4 chip, also found on the other three Pixel 9 phones. The chip comes paired with 16GB of RAM and up to 1TB storage. Then, there‚Äôs theTitan M2 security coprocessor , which enables multi-layer hardware security.There‚Äôs a 5,060mAh battery, which Google promises will last for over 24 hours and up to 100 hours with Extreme Battery Saver. The phone supports fast charging at 45W, which should fill up the battery up to 55% in about 30 minutes. FYI, the charger isn‚Äôt included in the box. The phone also supports Qi wireless charging and Battery Share, i.e., reverse wireless charging.Out-of-the-box the Pixel 9 Pro Fold will come with Android 14 . There‚Äôs the usual Google promise of 7 years of OS and security updates.Would it even be a Pixel phone, if there‚Äôs no AI in it. Well, there‚Äôs a whole lot of AI. For starters Gemini is there, and it works in split-screen mode, as well. One could ask Gemini to write stuff or even get info about whats‚Äôs on the screen or photos. Circle To Search is also there, ohh and this feature can help you check if an image has been created using AI.The new ‚ÄúPixel-exclusive‚Äù AI feature to arrive is Pixel Screenshots. The feature could organise or recall things, like events and location, all you need to is ask the phone.Google is giving one year of the Google One AI Premium plan for free to those who‚Äôll buy the Pixel 9 Pro Fold. So, that‚Äôll give you access to Gemini Advanced, Gemini in Gmail and Docs, on top of 2TB of cloud storage.The Pixel 9 Pro Fold ditches the camera visor for a squircle module that houses a triple lens setup ‚Äì a 50MP wide camera, a 48MP ultraide and a 48MP 5x telephoto camera. For selfies, there's a 42 MP front-facing camera on the inner screen and 10MP camera on the outside.The camera hardware has been only a part of Pixel‚Äôs camera, but it‚Äôs AI that completes it. There‚Äôs a long list of AI features that complements the camera hardware on the Pixel 9 Pro Fold. The usual Super Res Zoom, Zoom Enhance, Video Boost, Face Unblur, Photo Unblur, Best Take, Magic Eraser, Audio Eraser, and Magic Editor makes their return. Well, Magic Eraser now has an a ‚Äúreimagine‚Äù feature that Google says can give photos a ‚Äúwhole new look.‚ÄùOne new AI tool to come to Google‚Äôs Pixel 9 pro Fold is the ‚ÄúAdd Me,‚Äù which as you‚Äôd image can add you to a picture. So, how does it work? Well, you take photo with the group, swap in yourself, and AI will merge the photos.Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold is priced in India at Rs 1,72,999 and will be available for purchase later this year. While it comes in two colours ‚Äì Obsidian and Porcelain ‚Äì it‚Äôll be available only in Obsidian colour in India.
Article Summary: Google has launched its second-generation Pixel foldable phone, the Pixel 9 Pro Fold. The second-gen Pixel Fold upgrades on some salient aspects over the first one. Per Google, the foldable is slim, super durable, and has a brighter screen, both on the outside and inside. And, the phone also packs in Pixel‚Äôs ‚Äúfastest, most powerful‚Äù Tensor G4 chip.

Article Title: Mark Zuckerberg installs sculpture of wife Priscilla Chang, says is bringing back this ‚ÄòRoman tradition‚Äô
Article Text:
Take a look at Mark Zuckerberg‚Äôs Instagram post

Facebook-parent Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg unveiled a colossal sculpture of his wife, Priscilla Chan , in the backyard of their expansive California estate. In an Instagram post, the 40-year-old CEO shared a photo of his wife standing next to the statue.‚ÄúBringing back the Roman tradition of making sculptures of your wife. Thanks @danielarsham,‚Äù Zuckerberg captioned his Instagram post which has both photo and video of the sculpture.The colorful artwork is made by US-based Daniel Arsham. It depicts Chan standing in a wind-blown silver garment.Mark Zuckerberg, wife Priscilla Chan's relationship timelineMark Zuckerberg is the founder, chairman and CEO of Meta, which he originally founded as Facebook in 2004. He started dating Chan in 2003 after meeting at a college party while Zuckerberg was still in Harvard.The two then married in 2012 and have three daughters together ‚Äì Maxima, August, and Aurelia.Sharing their story in a Facebook post last year, Zuckerberg wrote ‚ÄúWe met at a going away party my friends threw for me in college when they thought I was about to get kicked out of school. I asked her out but told her we'd need to go out soon since I might only have a few days left. Later on I started Facebook, we got married, and now have three wonderful girls. What a wild ride.‚ÄùReplying to Mark‚Äôs post, wife Priscillia wrote ‚ÄúThe more of me the better? ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äù. She also shared the post to her Instagram Stories writing, "You can‚Äôt miss me!".Other users commented on Zuckerberg's post. One of them wrote ‚ÄúHusbands everywhere are shaking,‚Äù. Another commented ‚ÄúHe just raised the bar for the rest of us,‚Äù.‚ÄúThis will be in a museum someday‚Äù, another user wrote.
Article Summary: Mark Zuckerberg unveiled a colossal sculpture of his wife, Priscilla Chan, in the backyard of their California estate. He started dating Chan in 2003 after meeting at a college party while Zuckerberg was still in Harvard. The two married in 2012 and have three daughters together ‚Äì Maxima, August, and Aurelia.

Article Title: PM Narendra Modi: 'Design in India, Design for World': What PM Narendra Modi's 'new slogan' for technology industry given on Independence Day means
Article Text:
Golden opportunity for Indian IT companies

Prime Minister Narendra Modi has a special ' make in India ' for the Indian IT industry this Independence Day. In an address to the nation from Red Fort on India's 78th Independence Day, PM Modi coined a new phrase -- " Design in India , Design for the world". Exalting the indigenous design capabilities of the Indian technology industry, PM Modi called upon Indian IT professionals to create products that cater to both domestic as well as international markets.In his address during the 78th Independence Day celebrations, "India is known for its best quality.Now, we need to focus on design and we need to try to make the Indian standard become the global standard."We have talent...in the field of design we can contribute immensely to the world. We need to move forward with the vision of 'Design in India, Design for the world'," he added.Prime minister said that many global companies want to invest in India and asked state governments to compete among themselves to attract them. "It is a golden opportunity to make India a hub of global manufacturing," he said, and called upon state governments to make policies to attract investment, while ensuring good governance and law and order.In sync with the Industry revolution 4.0, the PM said the government's focus is on comprehensive skill development across sectors, from agriculture to sanitation. "Vocal for Local" has become the mantra of India's arthatantra (economy), PM said.
Article Summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has a special'make in India'for the Indian IT industry. In an address to the nation from Red Fort on India's 78th Independence Day, PM Modi coined a new phrase -- " Design in India, Design for the world"

Article Title: CrowdStrike sued by fliers after Microsoft outage disrupted air travel, company responds
Article Text:
What CrowdStrike says

Delta Airlines seeks compensation for disruption

In mounting problems for CrowdStrike over Microsoft outage last month, the cybersecurity company being sued by air travellers in a latest move. According to a Reuters report, air travellers whose flights were delayed or cancelled on July 19 due to Microsoft Windows outage on July 19 have filed a class action against the company.The plaintiffs include three fliers who filed the lawsuit in the federal court, Austin, Texas.They blame CrowdStrike's negligence in testing and deploying its software for the outage. Adding further, they stated that as fliers scrambled to get to their destinations, many spent hundreds of dollars on lodging, meals and alternative travel, while others missed work or suffered health problems from having to sleep on the airport floor.The filers demand CrowdStrike to pay compensatory and punitive damages to anyone whose flight was disrupted.In a statement, CrowdStrike said "We believe this case lacks merit and we will vigorously defend the company." The US cybersecurity company also provided an identical statement in response to a shareholder lawsuit filed on July 31.Delta claims that it faced over 2,200 flight cancellations on July 19 alone, with more than 6,000 flights cancelled since then. The airline is now dealing with over 176,000 refund or reimbursement requests. The estimated cost of the outages could reach as high as $500 million.The company‚Äôs CEO Ed Bastian said last week the outage had cost the airline $500 million, adding that it plans to take legal action to get compensation from the cybersecurity firm.Microsoft outage on July 19 was caused by a faulty software update that impacted 8 million Windows computers worldwide. CrowdStrike has rejected Delta Airlines' claim stating that it is "highly disappointed by Delta's suggestion that CrowdStrike acted inappropriately and strongly rejects any allegation that it was grossly negligent or committed misconduct."
Article Summary: Air travellers whose flights were delayed or cancelled on July 19 have filed a class action against CrowdStrike. Plaintiffs include three fliers who filed the lawsuit in the federal court, Austin, Texas. They blame CrowdStrike's negligence in testing and deploying its software for the outage.

Article Title: Smiles, makeup: Why influencer Sarah Sarosh's video on Kolkata rape-murder has outraged internet
Article Text:
Sarah Sarosh's controversial video

Social media outrage on Sarah Sarosh's GRWM video

Sarah Sarosh‚Äôs apology

Also read

In the age of social media, influencers wield significant power to shape public opinion. And with this power they also have responsibility not only to the brands they promote but also to their followers', many of whom may trust them blindly. It appears that Sarah Sarosh, a fashion influencer with over 200K followers, forgot this very responsibility.In what can be called a repulsive post, Sarah Sarosh posted a video on the heinous Kolkata murder-rape case where she can be seen smiling and applying make-up.In one-minute-four-second video, which has now been deleted, she is promoting makeup products that she seemingly is endorsing, while a commentary on the brutal rape and murder case runs in the background. The video, criticised for being insensitive and out-of-touch, sparked widespread outrage across various social media platforms. Despite issuing an apology, the incident has ignited a broader conversation about the appropriateness of using certain social media formats to discuss such grave issues.The video in question was part of a "Get Ready With Me" (GRWM) series, a popular format where influencers apply makeup while engaging in conversation. In this particular video , Sarah Sarosh appeared cheerful and upbeat as she applied serums, face creams, and makeup, all while a voiceover narrated the harrowing details of a recent crime in Kolkata. The stark contrast between the lighthearted makeup tutorial and the grave subject matter led to an immediate backlash.The video has left users across platforms like Reddit, X (formerly Twitter), and Instagram shocked at her insensitivity. One Reddit user commented, ‚ÄúThis is so distasteful and insensitive. She will do anything for views,‚Äù reflecting a common sentiment that the video was made purely for attention, without regard for the gravity of the topic.Another user questioned the decision to pair such serious content with a GRWM format, saying, ‚ÄúAt this point, these people‚Äôs accounts should be banned. If she really had to talk about this topic, she could‚Äôve sat down rather than doing a GRWM. How are the audio and video related?‚ÄùOn X, one of the users labelled the video ‚ÄúAbsolutely disgusting,‚Äù while another user lamented the lengths some influencers will go for likes, stating, ‚ÄúLooks like there‚Äôs no end to how low they can go for likes. Nothing is off limits. No basic human decency is required.‚ÄùIn response to the backlash, Sarah Sarosh took to Instagram Stories to issue a public apology. She explained that her intent had been to raise awareness about the crime while also addressing her beauty content, which she had already filmed months earlier. ‚ÄúI posted a GRWM reel yesterday which was shot 2 months ago with a voiceover on the current affairs of the rape & murder incident,‚Äù she wrote. Sarosh admitted that she did not realise how ‚Äútone deaf‚Äù the video would appear, acknowledging that the mismatch between the content of the video and the subject of the voiceover was a grave error.Sarosh also shared her immediate reaction upon receiving negative comments, revealing that she deleted the video within five minutes of posting it. ‚ÄúThe comments made me realise instantly that the messaging is distasteful from my end,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúI deeply apologise for my actions to all those who have come across the content through screen recordings of my deleted content being circulated on other platforms.‚Äù
Article Summary: Sarah Sarosh, a fashion influencer with over 200K followers, posted a video on the heinous Kolkata murder-rape case where she can be seen smiling and applying make-up. The video, criticised for being insensitive and out-of-touch, sparked widespread outrage across various social media platforms. In response to the backlash, Sarah Sarosh took to Instagram Stories to issue a public apology.

Article Title: 'Flipkart Minutes' is here to take on Blinkit, Swiggy Instamart and BBNow; here‚Äôs the city its available in
Article Text: Flipkart, the Walmart-owned e-commerce giant, has launched its quick commerce service ' Flipkart Minutes ' in select areas of Bengaluru. The new offering promises lightning-fast 8-16 minute deliveries for a diverse range of products, spanning from groceries to electronics.With this move, Flipkart directly challenges established players in the booming quick commerce sector, including Swiggy's Instamart, Zomato's Blinkit , Zepto , and BigBasket's BB Now.The service, which was previously offered on a trial basis to employees at Flipkart's headquarters, is now available to users through the Flipkart app.We confirmed the service's availability by checking an address in HSR on the Flipkart app, which indeed showed Flipkart Minutes as an option for quick delivery. Additionally, several users on X (formerly Twitter) reported that Flipkart is delivering groceries and other items to their addresses in Bengaluru within minutes through the "Minutes" service.Sources familiar with the matter tell the Economic Times that Flipkart plans to expand the service to more areas in Bengaluru over the next few weeks.The launch of Flipkart Minutes comes at a time when other players in the quick commerce space are aggressively expanding their operations.The ET had earlier reported that Flipkart was planning to operate around 100 dark stores to bolster its quick-commerce offerings during the upcoming festive season. Dark stores, which are mini warehouses strategically located for rapid deliveries, have become a crucial component of quick commerce operations.Blinkit, for instance, recently announced ambitious plans to increase its dark store count to 2,000 by 2026. This doubles down on its earlier announced plans to have 1,000 dark stores by March 2025. Similarly, Zepto aims to double its network to 700 dark stores by March 2025. Swiggy Instamart , another major player, currently operates more than 500 such warehouses.Interestingly, Amazon, a key player in the e-commerce space, has not shown interest in the quick-commerce business in India so far. However, it does operate a grocery store service dubbed " Amazon Fresh ," offering same-day delivery for groceries. This is similar to what Flipkart has also been offering through its Grocery tab.
Article Summary: Flipkart has launched its quick commerce service'Flipkart Minutes'in select areas of Bengaluru. The new offering promises lightning-fast 8-16 minute deliveries for a diverse range of products, spanning from groceries to electronics. The service was previously offered on a trial basis to employees at FlipkART's headquarters.

Article Title: Google Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, Pixel 9 Pro XL with Gemini AI launched: Price in India, specifications and more
Article Text:
Google Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro and Pixel 9 Pro XL price in India, availability

Google Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro and Pixel 9 Pro XL specifications

Google Pixel 9

Google Pixel 9 Pro

Google Pixel 9 Pro XL

Read More |

Google Pixel 9 series is now official. The tech giant has launched the Google Pixel 9 , Pixel 9 Pro and Pixel 9 Pro XL in India with a suite of AI features across productivity apps and the camera. This will be the first Pixel smartphone to run Gemini Nano multimodal AI model on device.Google Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro and Pixel 9 Pro XL are price start at Rs 79,999, Rs 1,09,999, and Rs 1,24,999, respectively.The smartphones will be available in four colour options. The Pixel 9 is launched in Obsidian, Porcelain, Wintergreen and Peony colour options. The Pixel 9 Pro and Pixel 9 Pro XL are launched in Obsidian, Porcelain, Hazel and Rose Quartz colours.Google Pixel 9 and Google Pixel 9 Pro XL will be available for preorder starting August 14 and will go on sale on August 22. Details about the pre-orders and availability of the Pixel 9 Pro will be available later this year. The available smartphones can be purchased from Flipkart, and Croma as well as Reliance Digital offline stores.Google Pixel 9 sports a 6.3-inch Actua display with a peak brightness of 2,700 nits. The full-HD (1080 x 2424 pixels at 422 PPI) OLED display has 20:9 aspect ratio and 60-120Hz refresh rate. The display is protected by Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2.Under the hood is Google Tensor G4 SoC that is specially designed to handle AI and machine learning tasks. There is a Titan M2 security coprocessor, 12GB RAM and up to 256GB storage.As far as the camera is concerned, the phone gets a 50MP Octa PD wide camera with ∆í/1.68 aperture and 82-degree field of view. There is an ultrawide camera that packs a 48MP Quad PD sensor with an ultrawide lens that has ∆í/1.7 aperture and 123-degree field of view.On the front is a 10.5MP Dual PD selfie camera with autofocus, ∆í/2.2 aperture and 95-degree field of view. Other features include single-zone LDAF sensor, spectral and flicker sensor, and optical + electronic image stabilisation on the wide angle camera.Google is also bringing a bunch of AI features including: Super Res Zoom up to 8x, Add Me, Macro Focus, Night Sight, Astrophotography, Portrait Mode, Face Unblur, Long Exposure, Action Pan and Real Tone. Editing Features include Magic Editor, Magic Eraser, Best Take and Photo Unblur.The Google Pixel 9 packs a 4,700mAh battery and IP68 dust and water resistance rating. The smartphone will come preloaded with Android 14. Google is offering 7 years of OS, security, and Pixel Drop updates.Google Pixel 9 sports a 6.3-inch Super Actua display with a peak brightness of 3,000 nits and 1280 x 2856 pixels resolution. It is an LTPO OLED panel with 495 ppi, 20:9 aspect ratio and 1Hz-120Hz refresh rate. The display is protected by Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2.The smartphone is powered by Google Tensor G4 SoC that is specially designed to handle AI and machine learning tasks. There is a Titan M2 security coprocessor, 16GB RAM and up to 512GB storage.Coming to the camera, the Pixel 9 Pro sports a 50MP Octa PD wide camera with ∆í/1.68 aperture and 82-degree field of view. There is an ultrawide camera that packs a 48MP Quad PD sensor with an ultrawide lens that has ∆í/1.7 aperture and 123-degree field of view.There is a third telephoto camera 48MP Quad PD sensor paired with a lens that has ∆í/2.8 aperture, 22-degree field-of-view, 5x optical zoom and Super Res Zoom up to 30x.On the front is a 42MP Dual PD selfie camera with autofocus, ∆í/2.2 aperture and 103-degree field of view. Other features are similar to the Pixel 9. The phone packs a 4,700mAh battery and IP68 dust and water resistance rating, will come preloaded with Android 14 and will get 7 years of OS, security, and Pixel Drop updates.The largest of the trio, Google Pixel 9 Pro XL sports a 6.8-inch Super Actua display with a peak brightness of 3,000 nits and 1344 x 2992 pixels resolution. It is an LTPO OLED panel with 486 ppi, 20:9 aspect ratio and 1Hz-120Hz refresh rate. The display is protected by Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2.The SoC and camera specifications are the same as the Pixel 9 Pro. There is a Google Tensor G4 SoC, paired with a Titan M2 security coprocessor, 16GB RAM and up to 512GB storage. The Pixel 9 Pro XL gets a 50MP Octa PD wide camera, a 48MP Quad PD ultrawide shooter and a 48MP Quad PD telephoto camera.The phone gets a 42MP Dual PD selfie camera, packs a 5,060mAh battery and comes with IP68 dust and water resistance rating. Both the Pro models come with Ultra-Wideband chip for accurate ranging and spatial orientation.
Article Summary: Google Pixel 9 and Pixel 9 Pro will be available for preorder starting August 14 and will go on sale on August 22. The Google Pixel 9 sports a 6.3-inch Super Actua display with a peak brightness of 3,000 nits and 1280 x 2856 pixels resolution. The phone is powered by Google Tensor G4 SoC that is specially designed to handle AI and machine learning tasks.

Article Title: California man credits Apple Watch for saving his life: ‚ÄòI wouldn‚Äôt be here if it wasn‚Äôt for this little device‚Äô
Article Text:
Apple Watch detects user‚Äôs low heart rate



What doctor said

An Apple Watch user is crediting the smartwatch for saving his life after the wearable alerted him about a life-threatening condition. Peter Moore , a resident of Montecito, California shared his experience with a local news publisher KTLA. Narrating the incident, he said ‚ÄúI wouldn‚Äôt be here if it wasn‚Äôt for this little device‚Äù.Moore, who is a former tech executive, said that he was on his way to the airport when he began to feel ‚Äúa little lightheaded and a little faint‚Äù.‚ÄúLike a typical male, I thought, ‚ÄòI‚Äôll go to Starbucks. That‚Äôll fix it,'‚Äù Moore explained before he received a notification from the Apple Watch he was wearing.‚ÄúMy phone started to ping and said ‚Äòlow heart rate,‚Äô which I‚Äôd never seen before. And so I looked at it‚Ä¶ my heart rate had dropped to 32. And it was insistent in its notifications that something wasn‚Äôt right,‚Äù said Moore. He then contacted his wife who took him to hospital.‚ÄúThe doctor kind of theatrically ran in and said, ‚ÄòThis is not good. This is not good. You need a pacemaker right now,'‚Äù Moore said.Omid Yousefian, the cardiac electrophysiologist at Sansum Clinic Cardiology who treated Moore said ‚ÄúYes, his watch had a big role in saving his life‚Äù.‚ÄúThese days, 25% of the population over the age of 40 ‚Ä¶ have a high chance of experiencing atrial fibrillation,‚Äù Yousefian explained.‚ÄúFor us physicians, symptoms are the most important thing. [Moore] was notified by his watch that his heart rate is slow and he correlated that with the symptoms that he had. So he didn‚Äôt wait. He didn‚Äôt sit. He came to the hospital directly. So he made a very smart move,‚Äù Yousefian told the publication.
Article Summary: Peter Moore, a former tech executive, was on his way to the airport when he began to feel ‚Äúa little lightheaded and a little faint‚Äù He received a notification from the Apple Watch he was wearing that his heart rate had dropped to 32. He then contacted his wife who took him to hospital where he was diagnosed with atrial fibrillation.

Article Title: Google launches Pixel Watch 3 in India, comes in two sizes with improved health tracking and more
Article Text: Google has announced its new smartwatch, the Pixel Watch 3 . The new smartwatch comes with significant upgrades over its predecessor, like better performance, improved health tracking, and even a bigger size.The Pixel Watch 3 is crafted from 100% recycled aluminium, and is now available in two sizes ‚Äì41 mm and 45 mm. Both sizes feature the Actua display, which boasts up to 2000 nits of brightness - twice as bright as the previous model.The watch face has also been enlarged, with over 16% smaller bezels resulting in 10% more screen area on the 41 mm model and 40% more on the 45 mm version.One of the standout features of the Pixel Watch 3 is its advanced running capabilities. Users can now create customised running routines, complete with warm-ups, cooldowns, and interval training. The watch provides real-time guidance through audio and haptic cues, helping runners stay on track with their pace and heart rate targets.Health enthusiasts will appreciate the new readiness and cardio load tracking features. These additions help users balance their workout intensity with recovery time, potentially reducing the risk of overtraining. The watch also introduces the Fitbit Morning Brief , a daily summary of important health and fitness metrics delivered after waking up.Battery life has been improved, with the new model now offering 24 hours of use with the always-on display activated. In Battery Saver mode, it can last up to 36 hours without compromising core health and safety features.The 41mm size of the Pixel Watch is priced at Rs 39,900, while the larger 45mm comes at Rs 42,900. The 41 mm model is available in Matte Black, Polished Silver, and Champagne Gold, while the 45 mm version comes in Matte Black, Polished Silver, and Matte Hazel.Google is offering six months of Fitbit Premium membership with the purchase of a Pixel Watch 3, giving users access to additional insights and personalised recommendations.
Article Summary: The Pixel Watch 3 is crafted from 100% recycled aluminium, and is now available in two sizes ‚Äì41 mm and 45 mm. Both sizes feature the Actua display, which boasts up to 2000 nits of brightness - twice as bright as the previous model. The 41mm size of the Pixel Watch is priced at Rs 39,900, while the larger 45mm comes at Rs 42,900.

Article Title: iPhone 15 exchange scam on Amazon: Supreme Court lawyer shares how he was 'duped', and what buyers should not do
Article Text:
What exactly happened

Read the complete post here

In a shocking incident, a Supreme Court lawyer, Mukul P Unny , was scammed out of Rs 38,000 while attempting to exchange his iPhone 13 for an iPhone 15 on Amazon .in. The lawyer detailed his ordeal on social media, highlighting the fraudulent tactics employed by the delivery executive.Unny took X (formerly known as Twitter) to post about the new kind of smartphone exchange scam.The incident occurred on July 21, 2024, when Unny placed an order for the iPhone 15 on Amazon. The following day, a delivery executive arrived at his residence and handed over the new phone after receiving the necessary OTP. However, the executive then requested another OTP, claiming it was required to complete the exchange.Despite Unny's hesitation, he was convinced to return the new iPhone to the delivery executive after speaking to the latter's supervisor.Unny contacted Amazon customer care the following day to report the incident. Initially, Amazon assured him of a refund if the product was not delivered. However, subsequent inquiries revealed the case was under investigation with a resolution deadline of July 31.On July 31st, Amazon concluded its investigation and informed Unny that a refund was impossible. The company's explanation lacked substance, as they had not thoroughly verified the scam details. The fact that Unny still possessed his old iPhone directly contradicted Amazon's claim that the exchange was complete.While Amazon has eventually issued a refund to Unny, his ordeal underscores the considerable risks inherent in online transactions, even when dealing with reputable platforms like Amazon.Always verify the identity of a delivery executive before sharing your Amazon OTP. This crucial step can protect you from falling victim to scams.‚ÄúThis is the story of my worst experience with @amazonIN On 21.07.2024, I ordered iPhone 15 from Amazon in exchange for my iPhone 13. On 22.07.2024, the delivery executive came at around 930 PM. I gave the OTP and took the product, and gave my phone to the executive.He said I have give another OTP. I had already given the OTP and was wondering what other OTP is to be given for exchange. I said I dont have any other OTP than the one I have given. He stayed there for few minutes & then called his supervisor.After speaking with the supervisor, the delivery exec asked for return of the product since the "exchange is not final".I insisted that I speak with the supervisor. The supervisor tells me that the exchange is done by a different team & requests for the product to be returned. I said I cannot give away the product especially since the OTP is given and the app was showing that the product is delivered. But this supervisor Ashok (8076650306) requested me to return, lest his team will have to make for the loss.Upon his request and assurance that the product will be "reattempted" the next day, I gave the product to the delivery exec (Vishal 8826421956) after taking the supervisor's and the delivery exec's number. On 23.07.2024, I spoke with the Amazon Customer Care and raised a complaint to which I assured that refund will be initiated if the product is not delivered. Call centre asked me to follow up on 25.07.2024.On 26.07.2024,when I called them, the customer case asked me to wait till 31.05.2024 as "it has to be investigated". Today, when I call Amazon, they said "investigation" is complete and that refund cannot be initiated. No fact-finding was done by Amazon in this. Now, we are staring at a loss of Rs. 38000 and a possible scam done by supervisor, delivery exec and others at Amazon. If they say that the exchange is done, then they can very well see the old phone that I still use with me.This could happen to any one of you and please be aware while dealing with @amazonIN.‚Äù
Article Summary: Supreme Court lawyer Mukul P Unny was scammed out of Rs 38,000 while attempting to exchange his iPhone 13 for an iPhone 15 on Amazon.in. The lawyer detailed his ordeal on social media, highlighting the fraudulent tactics employed by the delivery executive. Amazon has eventually issued a refund to Unny.

Article Title: Google Pixel Buds Pro 2 with first Google Tensor AI chip launched: Price in India, specifications and more
Article Text:
Google Pixel Buds Pro 2 price in India, availability

Google Pixel Buds Pro 2 specifications



Google Pixel Buds Pro 2 TWS earphones have been launched in India. Google says that they are designed to be Google‚Äôs most comfortable and secure-fitting earbuds. This is the first time that the tech giant is bringing a custom Tensor chip for audio and AI features.Google Pixel Buds Pro 2 TWS earphones price in India is set at Rs 22,900.
